This channel contains video tutorials to support students who are studying physical chemistry.  These tutorials cover statistical mechanics, thermodynamics, electrochemistry, chemical kinetics, reaction mechanisms, surface science, and quantum mechanics. They are based on the book Physical Chemistry: How Chemistry Works ISBN 978-1-118-75112-1.
